atbash.title: Atbash
atbash.description: Replace A with Z, B with Y and so on... e.g. I like Dogs --> R orpv Wlth

reverse.title: Reverse
reverse.description: Reverse/Flip the text... e.g. I like Dogs --> sgoD ekil I
